body_html: @alsrgv The error mostly likely is due to rdma connection failures.I don't have any experience in multiple IB devices in a single box. But from your ib_devinfo log, it seems the first device "mlx5_0" was active and the second device "mlx5_1" was down. @bkovalev had a similar issue here: yahoo#5. Maybe he can clarify this.

But from your ib_devinfo log, it seems the first device "mlx5_0" was active and the second device "mlx5_1" was down.  @bkovalev had a similar issue here: yahoo#5. Maybe he can clarify this.
body: @alsrgv The error mostly likely is due to rdma connection failures.I don't have any experience in multiple IB devices in a single box. But from your ib_devinfo log, it seems the first device "mlx5_0" was active and the second device "mlx5_1" was down.  @bkovalev had a similar issue here: https://github.com/yahoo/tensorflow/issues/5. Maybe he can clarify this.
